item.title: Hmm... Can't figure out the error
item.dc:creator: @pk_fubway pk fubway
item.description:
@pk_fubway wrote:

`Rich:

You missed a bracket somewhere above line 13957 in your client class.

yes u can see the bracket missing and u didnt have to put the client up again
